newsitem.title: USA: Five shot dead gangland-style in Texas.
newsitem.headline: Five shot dead gangland-style in Texas.

text.p: Police are searching for three masked gunmen who entered a bar in this Southwest Texas border town and shot seven people gangland-style, killing five of them, police said on Monday.
"It appears to be a professional job," police spokesman Bill Pfeil said, adding that investigators were looking into the possibility of a drug or organised crime connection.

Two of the five who were killed were from El Paso -- the bar owner and a guitarist -- and three were from New Mexico, including two horse trainers. All were shot early Saturday with large calibre weapons at close range.

Pfeil said the surviving victims, both of whom remained in the hospital Monday in fair condition, told police three armed men entered the a bar wearing white masks and made everyone empty their pockets before lining them up and shooting them.
"It's under investigation, that's all I can say," he said.
